Package pulse.search.math

Class IndexedVector

  • java.lang.Object
    • pulse.search.math.Vector
      • pulse.search.math.IndexedVector
  • public class IndexedVector
extends Vector
    A Vector with components that have been associated with NumericPropertyKeywords.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      IndexedVector​(java.util.List<NumericPropertyKeyword> indices)
      Constructs an IndexedVector with the specified list of keywords.
      IndexedVector​(Vector v, java.util.List<NumericPropertyKeyword> indices)
      Constructs an IndexedVector based on v and a list of keyword indices

      static IndexedVector ceiling​(java.util.List<NumericPropertyKeyword> activeParameters)

      • ceiling

        public static IndexedVector ceiling​(java.util.List<NumericPropertyKeyword> activeParameters)
        Creates an IndexedVector with its components set as the maximum sensible (ceiling) values that can ever occur for each of the listed activeParameters.
        Parameters:
        activeParameters - a list of keywords which correspond to some default values (as loaded from .xml)
        Returns:
        an IndexedVector representing the 'ceiling', all components of which represent the maximum sensible values for each of the activeParameters.
